name: Turtle Trouble (Jersey House Studio)
description:
You play as Shelon the sea turtle who has her underwater home overtaken by the smelly smokestacks of a ferocious factory. SOAR through the skies of the Valley of Deboras, collect seaweed to rack up high scores, and reclaim your humble abode in this BULLET HELL ADVENTURE.

- CONTROLS -

WASD - Move your turtle around the screen

SPACE - Shoot a fireball when in Strong Turtle mode

- CREDITS -

Made by Jersey House Studio

Programmed by: 

Kenia Hale (keniahale.com)

Brenner Ryan

Turtle Design and Animation by: 

Meg Oswalt

Art, Animation, and Design by: 

David Klos

@sanbles

Sandra Shim

Jack McCaffrey

Music by:

Turtle Beach - Oakwood Station

Move Your Feet - Hugo Correia

InFlux - Jake and Jake

Girl with Balloon - Sayu

Flatout - Jake and Jake

Jersey House Studio is an animation collective that focuses on creating environmentally focused art and animation. If you want to find out more about us, follow us on social media or click on the link below to see our website!

www.jerseyhousestudio.com
